title: Sidefeel Women's Jeans High Waisted Wide Leg Loose Fit Straight Leg Zimbaplatinum Cropped Pants with Pockets
description: Featured: Sidefeel womens cropped jeans designed with a wide leg; the irregular raw hem finish gives the jeans a trendy and edgy look, making them a popular choice among fashion-conscious individuals

Material: Sidefeel zimbaplatinum jeans are crafted from cotton, which offers a second-skin-like fit. The fine fibers of this cotton provide a smooth and delicate touch, effectively reducing friction against the skin, making it ideal for extended wear

Match: Wide leg jeans are versatile and easy to style, pairing well with pullover sweaters, sweatshirts, cardigan sweaters or a blouse or a fitted top and shoes, making them a must-have item in any wardrobe

Occasion: Straight wide leg jeans are versatile and can be worn in a variety of settings. Such as office casual, club or holiday, they can be dressed up or down for any occasion, making them a versatile choice
Season: The fashion jeans can be worn all year round; Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter
